input.sentences: today there was an event at the rehab facility .
we arrived to a large audience .
we first were balancing balloons with a racket .
after we were interviewed for the news .
then the anchor read a story to the kids .
output.sentences: Men and women are attending an event at a rehab facility that is being filmed for the news.
Many people are showing up and making room for the cameras to film.
A man explains how things are done in the facility.
Someone who is being treated there is interviewed on camera.
The event is ended with a story book reading to the children of the people who are being treated at the facility.
